entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine ServerComparison.FunctionalTests.HelloWorldTests.HelloWorld #45378
    Test failures
  • XAML in Blazor SERVER side #45377
  • Model Binding Support for TimeOnly and DateOnly #45376
  • Force HTTPS Redirect URIs for all Oauth flows #45374
  • [Minimal APIs] async handlers with single `HttpContext` parameter are not working #45373
  • OpenIdConnect in version 7.0.0 is targeting only .net core 7.0 #45370
  • SignalR Client Windows Authentication returning 401Unautorized (update 6.0.11 -> 7.0.0) #45371
  • [API Proposal]: Add SkipStatusCodePages property to ApiBehaviorOptions #45369
  • SIGTERM signal in .NET 6 app deployed in azure Kubernetes service is not triggered #45366
  • [Minimal API] Incorrect OpenAPI definition of path, query and header parameters when there is a body and we're using WithOpenApi extension method #45365
  • Using angular template project. Running "ng serve" independently fails when trying to proxy request to dotnet. #45364
    8.0-preview1
  • [signalr-client-c++] Client send access_token in Qtcreator #45363
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #45361
  • Add support for `Finally`-like API to WebApplicationBuilder #45360
  • Remove/replace virtual method in UserManager.cs constructor #45358

Closed

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost with Minimal API on ASP.NET 6 #45252
  • Typed results (such as Created<T>) do not emit type discriminator from attribute-based polymorphic serialization introduced in .NET 7 #45357
  • Quickgrid Virtualize=true using Memory data not displaying entire data #45326
  • Unable to read request body after request.EnableBuffering #45340
  • WebApplicationFactory Client returns NotFound for all requests with Overriding Configure method #45372
  • Add SkipStatusCodePages flag to ApiBehaviorOptions #45260
  • Document migration process for SPA projects #44600
    8.0-MQ
  • Rare "The SSL connection could not be established, see inner exception. Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.. An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host." #45266
  • Blazor Baselines have hardcoded runtime version #44226
    8.0-MQ
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #41362
    Backlog
  • There is a performance issue with WeatherForecastController.cs #45353
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine HelloWorld #45379
    area-runtime
  • Add Logging to AuthenticationService Scripts #45375
    area-blazor
  • Allow concurrent accept (improve connection-accept performance) #45367
    area-runtime
  • Fix w3c Issue with unit test #45362
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Avoid allocations from getting JsonOptions in Minimal #45359
    Perf, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Automate setting milestone for servicing PRs when merged #45356
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45256
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45121
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Centralize well known types across analyzers #45314
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22580.8 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    blocked, area-web-frameworks
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2056969 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45273
    area-grpc
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
